content: original japanese name カエルマット *kaeru matto* direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted using standard crochet symbols **materials** * japanese size 10/0 10 0 mm crochet hook * approx 180g 108 meters bulky yarn color a * approx 15g 9 meters bulky yarn color b 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/iroiro/g719/2 pdf
